tool_description: Make it easy to see products on amazon in JSON format.
name: my-amx-scraper
title: my-amx-scraper

api_list.name: Product Details
api_list.description: Get the product details from Amazon.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-amx-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N7NV2KB"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-amx-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-amx-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{prodid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-amx-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
